name: eventcatalog
description: EventCatalog is a documentation platform for event-driven architectures. It inventories events, schemas, producers, and consumers in a browsable catalog so teams can understand and evolve event-based systems collaboratively.

features.title: Schema Management
features.description: Document event structures and formats. Clear data contracts

features.title: Producer & Consumer Tracking
features.description: Map event flows through systems. Understand dependencies

features.title: Browsable Catalog
features.description: Easy navigation of event-driven systems. Discover events quickly

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Shared understanding of event architecture. Aligned development

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep your architecture documentation private. Your events, your docs
